topic.title: Editing Modes
topic.shortdesc: includes several editing modes to suit your type of editing.

body.p:
The main editing area in includes several editing modes to suit the type of editing that you want to perform. You can easily switch between modes by clicking on the desired mode at the bottom of the main editing pane. offers the following editing modes:
Text - This mode presents the source of an XML document.
Grid - This mode displays an XML document as a structured grid of nested tables.
Author - This mode enables you to edit in a WYSIWYG-like editor.
Design - This mode is found in the schema editor and represents the schema as a diagram.
